SITE123 Pricing & Packages

All SITE123 Premium Plans Feature A 14 Day Money Back Guarantee

Do you have more questions about pricing?

Our free 24/7 live support is here for you. We will answer your questions and guide you to make sure you build a successful website. With our excellent support team you're never alone!

Frequently Asked Questions

Do I have to enter my credit card to sign up?

No. You can open a free website at any time with no credit card required. Entering a credit card is required only if you choose to go premium and upgrade your website.

How do I sign up for a package plan?

Every SITE123 website is free to use indefinitely. If you want to buy one of the package plans to enhance your site features, and to connect a unique domain name, you can do so at any time by clicking the Upgrade button.

Can I get a discount when I purchase?

Yes, we offer discounts on up-front longer term plans. The longer the plan commitment, the higher the percentage discount! You also receive a free year of domain service with the first purchase of any annual plan.

How many package plans do you have?

SITE123 has four packages: Basic, Advanced, Professional, and Gold. Each of these packages have specific features and are suited to different kinds of website users.

How long are your package plans?

SITE123 plans have four duration options: 3 months, 12 months, 24 months, and 36 months.

How much does it cost?

It is free! Our product is offered at no cost and includes hosting and the web editor with all its tools. No payment, no trial, no commitment. If you want to connect a custom domain then you will be charged as low as $10.8 per month (annual plan, paid up front).

Can I switch my package plan?

Yes you can! You can change your plan at any time by purchasing another plan or upgrading your current plan to a higher one and add only the difference between plans.

Do I need a separate web hosting service?

No, you don't! All SITE123 plans come with their own cloud hosting, making sure your website is secured and available all the time.

May I download my website?

No. SITE123 is a proprietary web service. Our services are offered online and are catered to your needs, and are being constantly upgraded and improved.

Can I buy domains from you?

Yes. You can buy as many domains as you want via your dashboard. Our powerful search domain tool lets you find the domains you want and then claim them if they are available.

Do you have plans with email accounts?

Yes we do! Our advanced, professional, and gold plans all come with email accounts you can claim and use. You can also buy additional email accounts separate of the package plans.
